attributes.action: Prevent any dignitaries or invited guests from the wearing of White Poppies.
attributes.additional_details: General public, war widows and Veterans spend this important time remembering the dead an injured. It's not a day for political statements.
attributes.background: The wearing of a white Poppy is seen as disrespectful and offensive to Veterans. I call on the government to prevent any MP's, dignitaries or invited guests from the wearing of a white Poppy in parliament,  TV, or at events marking Remembrance Day.
